Posts.Content: Hi all  I'm on the same journey as you all had mastectomy on the 15th Jan seen consultant beginning of Feb back in on 26th Feb full lymph node clearance , so back to square one , drain still doing its job ( hate it ) hopefully I can have it out later today  Doing exercise every day , watching crapy tv reading and resting to,help my body heal 2 ops in 6 weeks has floored me  Going back to see surgeon next Wednesday for treatment plan based on results from lymph nodes not looking forward to it  I'm not sleeping well ,wake up every morning first thing in my head is cancer .... ,  I need to go back to work and do normal things anyone else feel the same I honestly think I'm going mad  X
Posts.Title: Op over!
